effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the foe. It may also freeze the target solid.
